title: League launcher not working! (Mac)
body:
I was playing League yesterday, no problems. I woke up this morning and decided I'd try to get a game in. I open up the Launcher, and click the big orange button that says "LAUNCH"

and nothing happens. The Launcher closes as if it's done its job, and I'm left here wondering where I went wrong. I've repaired about three times, and re-downloaded and installed twice. Please help.

replies.body: Having the exact same problem as of todays update, tried reinstalling the whole thing, the kernel thing and even with the HextechRepairTool and nothing works… the client just don't open...
Having the same exact issue since an update today. Tried re-installing and "updating" the kernel file to no result.

not working for me. 
similar symptoms 

Mac Pro
OS X  10.75

I updated and launched and a bunch of error sounds rapid fired then LOL didnt open.  I went to try and open LOL again and nothing.  didnt even pop up.

I reinstalled and got a client to pop up.  I updated then click launch and nothing happens.  The updater goes away like it was successful then no client comes up after launch.  Sounds similar to these other problems.
Same problem (OS X El Capitan) just bounces once then nothing.... tried all solutions below, still nothing. Please resolve this Rito.
Same exact problem here. OSX lion
I have same problem as u, i can't resolve it (Win7).. When orange button (LAUNCH) shows up, and when i click it, nothing happens, i tryed to repair, reinstall, but doesn't works on my computer.

For your specific issue, a connection problem might be failing to connect you to the patching server so nothing is loading.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, using the mac instructions, to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Well i have personally gone step by step on the Connection issues, used the Hextech Repair Tool and tried reinstalling and force repatch but nothing happens, **it just doesn't open…. ** it just blink and it shuts down, no error message or anything, and opening it from the Play Lol file inside the package just do as its stated above when i click on Launch button **it just closes and does nothing...**

Little different for PC.  :D  If the patcher is launching, start off with a PC reboot to make sure nothing crashed in the background.  Follow up with each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS/antivirus is allowing League to launch.  That should fix you up.  :D

Im on a mac tho and did tried everything. 

Mac Pro OS X 10.75 
2 x 2.66 GHz Dual-Core Intel Xeon
9 GB 667 MHz DDR2
ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT

Interesting, it's strange then if the issue is persisting.  In this case, grab the logs provided by the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to a ticket.  Our tech team can work with you individually to see what the deal is.  See you there!
Great thanx, ill give it a couple of days of trying; it happened in the past but at that time i just switched back to classic client and that solved it but now there is no turning back =P
